[[Kakashi]] and [[Obito]] use [[Kamui]] to transport the opponent inside their [[Kamui's Dimension|pocket dimension]], where they strike their target with a series of cooperative [[taijutsu]] attacks. After gaining enough distance, Obito creates a [[Black Receiver]], through which Kakashi channels his [[Lightning Cutter]]. Obito launches the receiver, electrocuting and piercing them, both with the thrown receiver and the new ones which branch from it upon impact.
